document_data.name: Ember Me More
document_data.mainbody: '''Ember Me More''' was a specialty shop within [[Swordspoint]] in the city of [[Ravens Bluff]] that specialized in any and all items that were related to fireplace use and maintenance. The store was run by the Sweep brothers, [[Ashley Sweep|Ashley]] and [[Woodruff Sweep|Woodruff]], who built, repaired, and maintained fireplaces throughout the city.
document_data.Services: The Sweeps had a great selection of [[fire screen]]s, [[firegrate|grates]], [[bellows]], [[fire poker|pokers]], [[tongs]], [[coal]] [[shovel]]s, available in [[brass]], [[bronze]], or [[iron]], as well as other implements such as [[broom]]s, [[bellows]], [[tinderbox]]es, and [[striker]]s. They also sold slow-burning logs to provide longer-lasting warmth and comfort for their customers.
